static mean(fs)¶

Calculate the mean photon number

Parameters:

fs : frameseries

Series of photon frames
Returns:

double

Mean photon number

Notes

The mean photon number is calculated as

where is the total number of photons in frame and is the total number of frames in the series.

Examples

>>> fs.mean()
0.553

static subbinomal(fs)¶

Calculate the sub-binomial paramter

Parameters:

fs : photonpacket.frameseries

Series of photon frames
Returns:

double

The sub-binomial parameter

Notes

The sub-binomial parameter was introduced in [R1]

References

[R1](1, 2)
  1. Sperling, W. Vogel, and G. S. Agarwal, “Sub-binomial light”, Phys. Rev. Lett. 109, 093601 (2012).

Examples

>>> fs.subbinomial()
1
